trans-unit.source: Performs asymmetric encryption and decryption using the implementation of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> algorithm provided by the cryptographic service provider (CSP).
trans-unit.target: 會執行非對稱式加密和解密，方法是使用密碼編譯服務提供者 (CSP) 所提供的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> 演算法實作。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: This is the default implementation of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>.
trans-unit.target: 這是預設的實作<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider> supports key sizes from 384 bits to 16384 bits in increments of 8 bits if you have the Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider installed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider> 8 位元為增量來支援從 384 位元到 16384 位元的金鑰大小，如果您有 Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider 安裝。

trans-unit.source: It supports key sizes from 384 bits to 512 bits in increments of 8 bits if you have the Microsoft Base Cryptographic Provider installed.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有 Microsoft 基礎密碼編譯提供者安裝，它支援 8 位元為增量來從 384 位元到 512 位元的金鑰大小。

trans-unit.source: Valid key sizes are dependent on the cryptographic service provider (CSP) that is used by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider> instance.
trans-unit.target: 有效金鑰大小會視使用的密碼編譯服務提供者 (CSP)，而<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Windows CSPs enable keys sizes of 384 to 16384 bits for Windows versions prior to [!INCLUDE[win81](~/includes/win81-md.md)], and key sizes of 512 to 16384 bits for [!INCLUDE[win81](~/includes/win81-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Windows Csp 啟用金鑰之前的 Windows 版本的 384 到 16384 位元大小[!INCLUDE[win81](~/includes/win81-md.md)]，以及金鑰大小為 512 到 16384 位元[!INCLUDE[win81](~/includes/win81-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [CryptGenKey](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa379941\(v=vs.85\).aspx) function in the Windows documentation.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[CryptGenKey](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa379941\(v=vs.85\).aspx) Windows 文件中的函式。

trans-unit.source: Interoperation with the Microsoft Cryptographic API (CAPI)
trans-unit.target: 與 Microsoft 密碼編譯 API (CAPI) 的互通

trans-unit.source: Unlike the RSA implementation in unmanaged CAPI, the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider> class reverses the order of an encrypted array of bytes after encryption and before decryption.
trans-unit.target: 不同於 unmanaged 的 CAPI 的 RSA 實作<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>之後加密和解密之前加密的位元組陣列的順序會反轉的類別。

trans-unit.source: By default, data encrypted by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider> class cannot be decrypted by the CAPI `CryptDecrypt` function and data encrypted by the CAPI `CryptEncrypt` method cannot be decrypted by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，資料加密<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>類別不能由 CAPI 解密`CryptDecrypt`函式和 CAPI 所加密的資料`CryptEncrypt`方法無法解密<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>類別。

trans-unit.source: If you do not compensate for the reverse ordering when interoperating between APIs, the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider> class throws a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不會彌補反向的排序時的互通性的 Api，<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>類別會擲回<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>。

trans-unit.source: To interoperate with CAPI, you must manually reverse the order of encrypted bytes before the encrypted data interoperates with another API.
trans-unit.target: CAPI 與交互操作，您必須手動順序反轉加密位元組之前加密的資料才能與其他 API。

trans-unit.source: You can easily reverse the order of a managed byte array by calling the <xref:System.Array.Reverse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以輕鬆地反轉受管理的位元組陣列的順序呼叫<xref:System.Array.Reverse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>類別來加密的位元組陣列的字串，並再回字串解密的位元組。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會將匯出金鑰資訊建立使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>到<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAParameters>物件。

trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider" /> class using the default key.
trans-unit.target: 使用預設金鑰，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If no default key is found, a new key is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果不找到任何預設索引鍵，就會建立新的金鑰。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyNumber.Exchange> key pair suitable to encrypt session keys so that they can be safely stored and exchanged with other users.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會建立<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyNumber.Exchange>適合用來加密工作階段的金鑰組索引鍵，以便它們可以安全地儲存和與其他使用者交換。

trans-unit.source: The generated key corresponds to a key generated using the `AT_KEYEXCHANGE` value used in the unmanaged Microsoft Cryptographic API (CAPI).
trans-unit.target: 產生的索引鍵對應至使用產生的索引鍵`AT_KEYEXCHANGE`用在 unmanaged Microsoft 密碼編譯 API (CAPI) 的值。

trans-unit.target: 要使用的金鑰大小，以位元為單位。

trans-unit.target: 使用指定的金鑰大小，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If no default key is found, a new key is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果不找到任何預設索引鍵，就會建立新的金鑰。

trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會建立<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyNumber.Exchange>適合用來加密工作階段的金鑰組索引鍵，以便它們可以安全地儲存和與其他使用者交換。

trans-unit.source: The generated key corresponds to a key generated using the `AT_KEYEXCHANGE` value used in the unmanaged Microsoft Cryptographic API (CAPI).
trans-unit.target: 產生的索引鍵對應至使用產生的索引鍵`AT_KEYEXCHANGE`用在 unmanaged Microsoft 密碼編譯 API (CAPI) 的值。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>、 產生新的金鑰，並將它儲存到金鑰容器中。

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic service provider (CSP) cannot be acquired.
trans-unit.target: 無法取得密碼編譯服務提供者 (CSP)。

trans-unit.target: 要傳遞給密碼編譯服務提供者 (CSP) 的參數。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider" /> class with the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的參數，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates or reuses a key container specified using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters.KeyContainerName> field of the `parameters` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式建立，或使用指定的金鑰容器會重複使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters.KeyContainerName>欄位`parameters`參數。

trans-unit.source: By default, this constructor creates an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyNumber.Exchange> key pair suitable to encrypt session keys so that they can be safely stored and exchanged with other users.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，這個建構函式會建立<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyNumber.Exchange>適合用來加密工作階段的金鑰組索引鍵，以便它們可以安全地儲存和與其他使用者交換。

trans-unit.source: The generated key corresponds to a key generated using the `AT_KEYEXCHANGE` value used in the unmanaged Microsoft Cryptographic API (CAPI).
trans-unit.target: 產生的索引鍵對應至使用產生的索引鍵`AT_KEYEXCHANGE`用在 unmanaged Microsoft 密碼編譯 API (CAPI) 的值。

trans-unit.source: You can create a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyNumber.Signature> key pair suitable for authenticating (digitally signed) messages or files by setting the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters.KeyNumber> field of the `parameters` parameter to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyNumber.Signature> value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyNumber.Signature>金鑰組適用於驗證 （數位簽章） 的訊息或檔案，藉由設定<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters.KeyNumber>欄位`parameters`參數<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyNumber.Signature>值。

trans-unit.source: This type of key corresponds to the `AT_SIGNATURE` value used in CAPI.
trans-unit.target: 這種類型的索引鍵對應至`AT_SIGNATURE`CAPI 中使用的值。

trans-unit.source: If you create an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider> object with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyNumber.Exchange> value specified and then create another <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider> object with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyNumber.Signature> value specified, both keys will be placed in a single container if both objects specify the same key container name.
trans-unit.target: 如果您建立<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>物件<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyNumber.Exchange>值指定，然後再建立另一個<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>物件<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyNumber.Signature>指定值，將單一容器中放置兩個索引鍵，如果這兩個物件指定相同的金鑰容器名稱.

trans-unit.source: To create a key that is compatible with stong-name signing using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider> class, you must create a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyNumber.Signature> key pair.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立與 stong 名稱簽章使用的索引鍵<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>類別，您必須建立<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyNumber.Signature>金鑰組。

trans-unit.target: 若要建立與 stong 名稱簽章使用的索引鍵<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>類別，您必須建立<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyNumber.Signature>金鑰組。

trans-unit.source: The CSP cannot be acquired.
trans-unit.target: 無法取得 CSP。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The key cannot be created.
trans-unit.target: 無法建立金鑰。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CspKeyContainerInfo" /> object that describes additional information about a cryptographic key pair.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CspKeyContainerInfo" /> 物件，其描述密碼編譯金鑰組的其他相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CspKeyContainerInfo" /> object that describes additional information about a cryptographic key pair.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CspKeyContainerInfo" /> 物件，其描述密碼編譯金鑰組的其他相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo%2A> property to retrieve additional information about a cryptographic key pair.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo%2A>屬性來擷取密碼編譯金鑰組的其他資訊。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspKeyContainerInfo> object describes whether the key is exportable, and specifies the key container name, information about the provider, and other information.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspKeyContainerInfo>物件描述金鑰是否可匯出，並指定金鑰容器名稱、 資訊提供者，以及其他資訊。

trans-unit.source: In cases where a random key is generated, a key container will not be created until you call a method that uses the key.
trans-unit.target: 在產生的隨機金鑰的地方的情況下，直到您呼叫的方法，會使用金鑰不會建立的金鑰容器。

trans-unit.source: Some properties of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspKeyContainerInfo> object returned by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo%2A> property will throw a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> if a key container has not been created.
trans-unit.target: 某些屬性<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspKeyContainerInfo>所傳回物件<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo%2A>屬性將會擲回<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>如果尚未建立的金鑰容器。

trans-unit.source: To make sure that a key container has been created, call a method such as <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.Encrypt%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.Decrypt%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.SignData%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider.SignHash%2A>, and so on, before you call the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要確定已建立的金鑰容器，呼叫的方法如<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.Encrypt%2A>， <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.Decrypt%2A>， <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.SignData%2A>， <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider.SignHash%2A>，依此類推，之前先呼叫<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspKeyContainerInfo>屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to perform direct <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> decryption using OAEP padding (only available on a computer running Microsoft Windows XP or later); otherwise, <see langword="false" /> to use PKCS#1 v1.5 padding.

trans-unit.target: 以 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> 演算法解密資料。

trans-unit.source: The decrypted data, which is the original plain text before encryption.
trans-unit.target: 解密的資料，亦即加密前的原始純文字。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.Encrypt%2A> to encrypt data for decryption with this method.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.Encrypt%2A>若要使用此方法加密資料解密。

trans-unit.source: The following code example encrypts and decrypts data.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會加密和解密資料。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the <xref:System.Text.ASCIIEncoding> class; however, the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding> class may be preferable in large data operations.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用<xref:System.Text.ASCIIEncoding>類別; 不過，<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding>類別可能會比在大型的資料作業。

trans-unit.source: The encrypted value can be saved as an `nvarchar` data type in Microsoft SQL Server 2005.
trans-unit.target: 加密的值可以儲存為`nvarchar`Microsoft SQL Server 2005 中的資料類型。

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic service provider (CSP) cannot be acquired.
trans-unit.target: 無法取得密碼編譯服務提供者 (CSP)。

trans-unit.source: -or-

The <paramref name="fOAEP" /> parameter is <see langword="true" /> and the length of the <paramref name="rgb" /> parameter is greater than <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.KeySize" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="fOAEP" /> 參數為 <see langword="true" />，而且 <paramref name="rgb" /> 參數的長度大於 <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.KeySize" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example initializes an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider> object to the value of a public key (sent by another party), generates a session key using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManaged> algorithm, and then encrypts the session key using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會初始化<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>的公開金鑰 （另一個合作對象所傳送），值的物件產生的工作階段金鑰 using<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManaged>演算法，然後加密工作階段金鑰使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>物件。

trans-unit.source: Using this scheme, the session key could be sent back to the owner of the private RSA key and the two parties could use the session key to exchange encrypted data.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個機制，工作階段金鑰無法傳送回 RSA 私密金鑰的擁有者，而且兩個合作對象無法使用工作階段金鑰交換加密的資料。

trans-unit.target: 無法取得密碼編譯服務提供者 (CSP)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the key exchange algorithm available with this implementation of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得可配合這個 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> 實作使用的金鑰交換演算法名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the key exchange algorithm if it exists; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在，則為金鑰交換演算法的名稱，否則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This property indicates the name of the algorithm, not of the type.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性表示的演算法，而不是類型的名稱。

trans-unit.source: For example, RSA-PKCS1-KeyEx is a key exchange algorithm name.
trans-unit.target: 例如，RSA-PKCS1-KeyEx 是金鑰交換演算法名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the size of the current key.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前金鑰的大小。

trans-unit.source: The size of the key in bits.
trans-unit.target: 金鑰的大小，以位元為單位。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider> supports key sizes from 384 bits to 16384 bits in increments of 8 bits if you have the Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider installed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider> 8 位元為增量來支援從 384 位元到 16384 位元的金鑰大小，如果您有 Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider 安裝。

trans-unit.source: It supports key sizes from 384 bits to 512 bits in increments of 8 bits if you have the Microsoft Base Cryptographic Provider installed.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有 Microsoft 基礎密碼編譯提供者安裝，它支援 8 位元為增量來從 384 位元到 512 位元的金鑰大小。

trans-unit.source: Valid key sizes are dependent on the cryptographic service provider (CSP) that is used by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider> instance.
trans-unit.target: 有效金鑰大小會視使用的密碼編譯服務提供者 (CSP)，而<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Windows CSPs enable key sizes of 384 to 16384 bits for Windows versions prior to [!INCLUDE[win81](~/includes/win81-md.md)], and key sizes of 512 to 16384 bits for [!INCLUDE[win81](~/includes/win81-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Windows Csp 啟用金鑰大小為 384 到 16384 位元 Windows 版本早於[!INCLUDE[win81](~/includes/win81-md.md)]，以及金鑰大小為 512 到 16384 位元[!INCLUDE[win81](~/includes/win81-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [CryptGenKey](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa379941\(v=vs.85\).aspx) function in the Windows documentation.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[CryptGenKey](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa379941\(v=vs.85\).aspx) Windows 文件中的函式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider> class does not allow you to change key sizes using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.KeySize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>類別不允許您變更使用的金鑰大小<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.KeySize%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Any value written to this property will fail to update the property without error.
trans-unit.target: 任何寫入這個屬性的值將無法更新不會發生錯誤的屬性。

trans-unit.source: To change the key size, use one of the constructor overloads.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更金鑰的大小，請使用其中一個建構函式多載。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the key should be persisted in the cryptographic service provider (CSP).
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示金鑰是否應該保存在密碼編譯服務提供者 (CSP) 中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the key should be persisted in the CSP; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果金鑰應保留在 CSP 中，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to persist a key in a key container.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性來保存金鑰容器中的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.PersistKeyInCsp%2A> property is automatically set to `true` when you specify a key container name in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters.KeyContainerName> field of a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters> object and use it to initialize an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider> object by calling one of the constructors with a `parameters` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.PersistKeyInCsp%2A>屬性會自動設定為`true`當您指定的金鑰容器名稱<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters.KeyContainerName>欄位<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters>物件，並使用它來初始化<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>物件透過呼叫其中一個建構函式與`parameters`參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.PersistKeyInCsp%2A> property has no effect if the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider> object is created with a `null` key container name.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.PersistKeyInCsp%2A>屬性沒有任何作用，如果<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>物件會透過`null`金鑰容器名稱。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider" /> object contains only a public key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider" /> 物件只包含公用金鑰則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider> class can be initialized either with a public key only or with both a public and private key.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>類別可以是初始化是唯一的公開金鑰，或具有兩個公用和私用的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.PublicOnly%2A> property to determine whether the current instance contains only a public key or both a public and private key.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.PublicOnly%2A>屬性來判斷目前的執行個體是否包含只是公開金鑰或公開金鑰和私密金鑰的金鑰。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the signature algorithm available with this implementation of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得可配合這個 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> 實作使用的簽章演算法名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the signature algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 簽章演算法的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This property is used in XML digital signature classes to indicate the algorithm URI.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性在 XML 數位簽章類別用於表示演算法的 URI。

trans-unit.source: In this implementation, this property always returns http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#rsa-sha1.
trans-unit.target: 在這個實作中，這個屬性永遠傳回 http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#rsa-sha1。

trans-unit.source: Computes the hash value of the specified data and signs it.
trans-unit.target: 計算指定資料的雜湊值並進行簽署。

trans-unit.source: The input data for which to compute the hash.
trans-unit.target: 用來計算雜湊值的輸入資料。

trans-unit.source: The hash algorithm to use to create the hash value.
trans-unit.target: 要用來建立雜湊值的雜湊演算法。

trans-unit.source: Computes the hash value of the specified byte array using the specified hash algorithm, and signs the resulting hash value.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的雜湊演算法，並簽署產生的雜湊值，來為指定的位元組陣列計算出雜湊值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> signature for the specified data.
trans-unit.target: 指定資料的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> 簽章。

trans-unit.source: This method creates a digital signature that is verified using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.VerifyData%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會建立使用驗證的數位簽章<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.VerifyData%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The `halg` parameter can accept a <xref:System.String>, a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm>, or a <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: `halg`參數可以接受<xref:System.String>、 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm>，或<xref:System.Type>。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="halg" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="halg" /> 參數不是有效類型。

trans-unit.source: The input data for which to compute the hash.
trans-unit.target: 用來計算雜湊值的輸入資料。

trans-unit.source: The hash algorithm to use to create the hash value.
trans-unit.target: 要用來建立雜湊值的雜湊演算法。

trans-unit.source: Computes the hash value of the specified input stream using the specified hash algorithm, and signs the resulting hash value.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的雜湊演算法，來為指定的輸入資料流計算出雜湊值，並簽署產生的雜湊值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> signature for the specified data.
trans-unit.target: 指定資料的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> 簽章。

trans-unit.target: `halg`參數可以接受<xref:System.String>、 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm>，或<xref:System.Type>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example signs and verifies data.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會簽署並驗證資料。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="halg" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="halg" /> 參數不是有效類型。

trans-unit.source: The input data for which to compute the hash.
trans-unit.target: 用來計算雜湊值的輸入資料。

trans-unit.source: The offset into the array from which to begin using data.
trans-unit.target: 陣列中的座標，從此處開始使用資料。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes in the array to use as data.
trans-unit.target: 陣列中要用作資料的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: The hash algorithm to use to create the hash value.
trans-unit.target: 要用來建立雜湊值的雜湊演算法。

trans-unit.source: Computes the hash value of a subset of the specified byte array using the specified hash algorithm, and signs the resulting hash value.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的雜湊演算法，並簽署產生的雜湊值，來為指定的位元組陣列子集計算出雜湊值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> signature for the specified data.
trans-unit.target: 指定資料的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> 簽章。

trans-unit.source: This method creates a digital signature that is verified using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.VerifyData%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會建立使用驗證的數位簽章<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.VerifyData%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The `halg` parameter can accept a <xref:System.String>, a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm>, or a <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: `halg`參數可以接受<xref:System.String>、 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm>，或<xref:System.Type>。

trans-unit.source: The string value can be one of the following:
trans-unit.target: 字串值可以是下列其中一項：

trans-unit.source: The object identifier (OID) friendly name of the hash algorithm to use, either a name registered in the crypto config file or one in the Crypto API OID table.
trans-unit.target: 物件識別碼 (OID) 易記名稱使用雜湊演算法，加密組態檔或 Crypto API OID 資料表中的其中一個註冊的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The OID value.
trans-unit.target: OID 值。

trans-unit.source: The OID must be one recognized by the Crypto API.
trans-unit.target: OID 必須辨識的 Crypto API。

trans-unit.source: For example, you could use SignData(new byte[5], "1.3.14.3.2.26") or SignData(new byte[5], "sha1"), or SignData(new byte[5], "SHA1").
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用 SignData （新位元組 [5]，"1.3.14.3.2.26"） 或 SignData （新的位元組 [5]，"sha1"） 或 SignData （新位元組 [5]，"SHA1"）。

trans-unit.source: The following code example signs and verifies data.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會簽署並驗證資料。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="halg" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="halg" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="halg" /> parameter is not a valid type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="halg" /> 參數不是有效類型。

trans-unit.source: Computes the signature for the specified hash value by encrypting it with the private key.
trans-unit.target: 經過私密金鑰的加密，為指定的雜湊值計算出簽章。

trans-unit.source: The hash value of the data to be signed.
trans-unit.target: 要簽署之資料的雜湊值。

trans-unit.source: The hash algorithm identifier (OID) used to create the hash value of the data.
trans-unit.target: 用以建立該資料雜湊值的雜湊演算法識別項 (OID)。

trans-unit.source: Computes the signature for the specified hash value by encrypting it with the private key.
trans-unit.target: 經過私密金鑰的加密，為指定的雜湊值計算出簽章。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> signature for the specified hash value.
trans-unit.target: 指定雜湊值的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> 簽章。

trans-unit.source: This method creates a digital signature that is verified using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.VerifyHash%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會建立使用驗證的數位簽章<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.VerifyHash%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The valid hash algorithms are <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.MD5>.
trans-unit.target: 有效的雜湊演算法為<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1>和<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.MD5>。

trans-unit.source: The algorithm identifier can be derived from the hash name by using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig.MapNameToOID%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 演算法識別項可以使用衍生自雜湊名稱<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig.MapNameToOID%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example encrypts some data, creates a hash of the encrypted data, and then signs hash with a digital signature.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會加密部分資料、 建立加密資料的雜湊，然後簽署 數位簽章的雜湊。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rgbHash" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

There is no private key.

trans-unit.source: for permission to sign a file using the key.

trans-unit.target: 安全性動作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />。

trans-unit.source: The hash value of the data to be signed.

trans-unit.target: 用來建立該資料雜湊值的雜湊演算法名稱。

trans-unit.target: 填補。

trans-unit.source: Computes the signature for the specified hash value by encrypting it with the private key using the specified padding.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的填補，並經過私密金鑰的加密，來為指定的雜湊值計算出簽章。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> signature for the specified hash value.

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="hash" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

<paramref name="padding" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="padding" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="padding" /> 不等於 <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Pkcs1" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the key should be persisted in the computer's key store instead of the user profile store.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示是否應該將金鑰保存在電腦的金鑰存放區中，而非使用者設定檔存放區。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the key should be persisted in the computer key store; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果金鑰應保留在電腦金鑰存放區中，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `true` is equivalent to passing the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspProviderFlags.UseMachineKeyStore> flag to a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters> object.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性設定為`true`相當於傳遞<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspProviderFlags.UseMachineKeyStore>旗標設為<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.UseMachineKeyStore%2A> property applies to all code in the current application domain, whereas the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters> object applies only to classes that explicitly reference it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.UseMachineKeyStore%2A>屬性會套用至目前的應用程式定義域中的所有程式碼，而<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters>物件只適用於明確地參考它的類別。

trans-unit.source: These settings are useful when impersonating or running under an account whose user profile is not loaded.
trans-unit.target: 這些設定會模擬或未載入其使用者設定檔的帳戶下執行時很有用。

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.UseMachineKeyStore%2A> affects the key store location only if <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider> is initialized with no parameters.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.UseMachineKeyStore%2A>會影響金鑰存放區位置才<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>初始化不含任何參數。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider> object and sets the static <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.UseMachineKeyStore%2A> property to use the machine key store instead of the user profile key store.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>物件，並設定靜態<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.UseMachineKeyStore%2A>屬性，以使用電腦金鑰存放區，而不是使用者設定檔金鑰存放區。

trans-unit.source: Verifies that a digital signature is valid.
trans-unit.target: 驗證數位簽章是否有效。

trans-unit.source: The data that was signed.
trans-unit.target: 已簽署的資料。

trans-unit.source: The name of the hash algorithm used to create the hash value of the data.
trans-unit.target: 用以建立該資料雜湊值的雜湊演算法名稱。

trans-unit.source: The signature data to be verified.
trans-unit.target: 要驗證的簽章資料。

trans-unit.source: Verifies that a digital signature is valid by determining the hash value in the signature using the provided public key and comparing it to the hash value of the provided data.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供的公開金鑰，並和所提供資料的雜湊值比較，來為簽章判斷雜湊值，藉此驗證數位簽章是否有效。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the signature is valid; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果簽章有效則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method verifies the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> digital signature produced by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.SignData%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會驗證<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>所產生的數位簽章<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.SignData%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The signature is verified by obtaining the hash value from the signature using the public key it was signed with, and comparing that value to the hash value of the provided data.
trans-unit.target: 取得雜湊值，從使用的公開金鑰簽署，簽章驗證的簽章，以及提供資料的雜湊值的值比較。

trans-unit.source: The `halg` parameter can accept a <xref:System.String>, a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm>, or a <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: `halg`參數可以接受<xref:System.String>、 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm>，或<xref:System.Type>。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.VerifyData%2A> method to verify a signature.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.VerifyData%2A>方法來驗證簽章。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="halg" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="halg" /> parameter is not a valid type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="halg" /> 參數不是有效類型。

trans-unit.source: Verifies that a digital signature is valid.
trans-unit.target: 驗證數位簽章是否有效。

trans-unit.source: The hash value of the signed data.
trans-unit.target: 已簽署資料的雜湊值。

trans-unit.source: The hash algorithm identifier (OID) used to create the hash value of the data.
trans-unit.target: 用以建立該資料雜湊值的雜湊演算法識別項 (OID)。

trans-unit.source: The signature data to be verified.
trans-unit.target: 要驗證的簽章資料。

trans-unit.source: Verifies that a digital signature is valid by determining the hash value in the signature using the provided public key and comparing it to the provided hash value.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供的公開金鑰，並和提供的雜湊值比較，來為簽章判斷雜湊值，藉此驗證數位簽章是否有效。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the signature is valid; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果簽章有效則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method verifies the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> digital signature produced by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.SignHash%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會驗證<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>所產生的數位簽章<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.SignHash%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The signature is verified by obtaining the hash value from the signature using the public key it was signed with, and comparing that value to the hash value of the provided data.

trans-unit.source: The algorithm identifier can be derived from the hash name by using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig.MapNameToOID%2A> method.

trans-unit.source: The hash value of the signed data.
trans-unit.target: 已簽署資料的雜湊值。

trans-unit.source: The signature data to be verified.
trans-unit.target: 要驗證的簽章資料。

trans-unit.source: The hash algorithm name used to create the hash value.
trans-unit.target: 用來建立該雜湊值的雜湊演算法名稱。

trans-unit.source: The padding.
trans-unit.target: 填補。

trans-unit.source: Verifies that a digital signature is valid by determining the hash value in the signature using the specified hashing algorithm and padding, and comparing it to the provided hash value.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的雜湊演算法和填補，並和提供的雜湊值比較，來為簽章判斷雜湊值，藉此驗證數位簽章是否有效。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the signature is valid; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果簽章有效則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="hashAlgorithm" /> is <see langword="null" /> or <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="hashAlgorithm" /> 為 <see langword="null" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="hash" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="hash" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="padding" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="padding" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="padding" /> does not equal <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Pkcs1" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="padding" /> 不等於 <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Pkcs1" />。
